mapper.select: SELECT s.comId, s.money, date_format(s.endTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endDate, s.phoneNumber, s.name, s.type, date_format(s.startDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as startDate, date_format(s.createDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate, s.surplusNumber, c.name as comName, c.phone FROM service s LEFT JOIN company c ON c.id = s.comId ORDER BY createDate DESC
